subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Upset by what he said were officiating mistakes in Dallas's overtime defeat Sunday, Mark Cuban, the billionaire owner of the Mavericks, went onto the court after the game and used profanity in berating the referee Joe DeRosa.
snippet: Upset by what he said were officiating mistakes in Dallas's overtime defeat Sunday, Mark Cuban, the billionaire owner of the Mavericks, went onto the court after the game and used profanity in berating the referee Joe DeRosa.
